about.title: We Are CruzHacks
about.body: CruzHacks rewards new ideas and innovationâ€” hackers have the chance to use creative and problem-solving skills for solving real-world problems. Open to individuals with any level of experience, Cruzhacks provides the opportunity to apply knowledge and use industry-leading tools.

mission.title: The CruzHacks Mission
mission.body: CruzHacks is a global event where people can collaborate, network, and apply technology to solve problems! Our initiative is to expand diversity in tech by inspiring the drive to innovate in all our participants.
